headline.main: As US Aid and Influence Shrinks in Pakistan, China Steps In
headline.print_headline: As US Aid and Influence Shrinks in Pakistan, China Steps In

lead_paragraph: Pakistani leaders often wax lyrical about their "sweeter than honey" relations with all-weather friend China. There's no romance about their marriage of convenience with America.
snippet: Pakistani leaders often wax lyrical about their "sweeter than honey" relations with all-weather friend China. There's no romance about their marriage of convenience with America....
